description:
Tohyama Tadayoshi, another seventeen years old is one of the seven main protagonists of RAINBOW. Nicknamed Soldier, he has been detained for acts of violence and false imprisonments. He ruthlessly struck his mother`s boyfriend, seriously injuring the man.
Tohyama have a well built body, despite that he couldn`t match against Sakuragi when they started a six against one fight against Sakuragi.
name: Tooyama Tadayoshi
